title: Minna protest rattles Tinubu administration, President gives orders on food prices
sub: The government is very concerned about what Nigerians are going through, especially what happened in Minna yesterday.

title: Afcon 2023: Nigeria captain William Troost-Ekong dreams of lifting trophy
sub: Nigeria captain William Troost-Ekong says lifting the Africa Cup of Nations trophy would be an 'amazing' moment for him and the country.

title: Wizkid my biggest influence – Shallipopi
sub: Popular singer, Crown uzama, aka Shallipopi, has revealed that Grammy-winning singer, Wizkid is his biggest musical influence.

title: British Vogue features 40 ‘legendary’ cover stars for editor Edward Enninful’s final issue
sub: For British Vogue’s final issue under Edward Enninful, the outgoing editor-in-chief put not one superstar on the cover, but 40 of them.
